# Int
<!-- This file was generated - DO NOT CHANGE IT MANUALLY -->



Excel INT(number): Rounds the given number down to the nearest integer.

## Parameter

### Function name

The name of the Excel function

- Datatype: `string`
- Default Value: `INT`
